channel.title: How to add npc?
channel.description: I was wondering if somebody could tell me a way, to add an NPC into my server and having it say something like Welcome! or so so. I'm not the best coder in the infact i don't really even know how to code but i know a little. if somebody could help me that would be such a big HELP!!!!!! ;D

item.title: How to add npc?
item.dc:creator: @Skull25 Skull25
item.description:
@Skull25 wrote:

kk First go to your server log in And type ::mypos That will tell you were you standing on if you move the thing changes sogo to a place you like then go to autospawn.cfg but stay loged in to your server

open npc.cfg look for an npc you want to add then do this

(example)

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType spawn = 2743 3243 9360 0 399 1165 56 40 2

this is only an example just copy down the stuff here or just look at your client it will tell you different numbers there you go

Read full topic
